data.name: Air Combat MF
data.detailed_description:
Note that this game is just an arcade game.

About game


This game is a 3D flight shooting arcade game.
An arcade game to complete multiple missions.

Compared to the previous XF series


Improved graphics.
The own map created after capturing the actual terrain.
Not only aircrafts but also ground weapons appears.
The number of enemies appearing at the same time decreased.

Controls


ESC: Pause
Mouse: Ascending, descending, turning
Right mouse click: Change weapon
Left mouse click: Shoot weapon
W: Speed up
S: Speed down
A, D: Move the aircraft to the left and right

Xbox controller


Ascending, descending, turning: Left stick
Speed up,Speed down,Move the aircraft to the left and right: Right stick
Change weapon : B
Shoot weapon: A

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core or AMD Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti,AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (7th) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
